rr.simple

Class ThreadLocalTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • rr.tool.Tool
      • rr.simple.ThreadLocalTool

  • public final class ThreadLocalTool
extends Tool
    Identifies thread local accesses and filters them out. Unsound -- see Eraser paper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Detail

      • access

        public void access(AccessEvent fae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each access event (read or write) in the target program. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        access in class Tool

      • volatileAccess

        public void volatileAccess(VolatileAccessEvent fae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Called for each volatile access event (read or write) in the target program. By default, passes the event to the next tool in the chain.
        Overrides:
        volatileAccess in class Tool

      • makeShadowVar

        public ShadowVar makeShadowVar(AccessEvent fae)
        Description copied from class: Tool
        Return a fresh variable state for this tool for the location being accessed. Will be called only once per location per tool, when the previous tool calls advance() to indicate that it is no longer interested in owning the location
        Overrides:
        makeShadowVar in class Tool
